summary:
Remade and restyled Prouspire Manor basement.
Fully upgradable in vanila style. Follower friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Remade and restyled Proudspire Manor basement.
It\'s now aditional, separated from other house cell.
Fully upgradable in vanilla style. Follower friendly.
Fully upgraded basement includes:
- Alchemy table
- Enchanting table
- Full crafting set
- 7 mannequins
- Stands and racks for about 50 weapons and 20 shields
- Unique build in wall shelves for about 300 books
- Custom labled chest for different types of items

Dawnguard reqired!

For proper book shelf functionality it\'s required Da5id\'s  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10891]Unlimited Bookshelves[/url], otherwise each bookshelf will hold only 2 books.

Updates:
1.100
- Fixed bugged weapon plagues
- Removed forgoten items, wich i used for testing.
- Fixed some spelling errors in merchand dialogue.

1.150
- Fixed some issues with bookshelves.
- It\'s now possible to craft Dawnguard related items at forge.
author: ad3d0
